info.name: erp
info.description:
## 简介

测试一下What does your API do?

## Overview
Things that the developers should know about

## Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

## Error Codes
What errors and status codes can a user expect?

## Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

## 其他

啦啦啦

request.description: 获取所有分支机构，不支持分页查询

{
	"address": "测试地址",

	"name": "测试名称",

}

	"note": "测试备注修改",

}

	"name": "测试名称修改",
	"code": "123",
	"note": "测试备注修改",

request.description: 获取商品的所有属性和属性值

item.name: 获取某个客户的所有回访记录

body.raw:
{
    "id": "1",
    "visit_type_id": "1",
    "time": "2018-04-20 11:12:59",
    "user_id": "1",
    "user_name": "陈建杭",
    "branch_id": "1",
    "customer_id": "1",
    "content": "这是回访内容修改",
    "note": "",
    "result": "这是结果"
}

{
    "visit_type_id": "1",
    "time": "2018-04-20 11:12:59",

}

	"title": "测试标题修改",

	"branch_id": 1
}
